mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product( prod_no , prod_name , prod_detail , manufacture_day , price, image_file, reg_date) VALUES ( seq_product_prod_no.nextval , #{prodName} , #{prodDetail:VARCHAR} , #{manuDate:VARCHAR} , #{price:NUMERIC} , #{fileName:VARCHAR} , SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date FROM product WHERE prod_no = #{value}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT p.PROD_NO, p.PROD_NAME, p.PROD_DETAIL, p.MANUFACTURE_DAY, p.PRICE, p.IMAGE_FILE, p.reg_date, t.tran_status_code FROM product p, transaction t
p.prod_no = t.prod_no(+)
AND p.PROD_NO like '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.PROD_NAME like '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.PRICE like '%${searchKeyword}%'
ORDER BY prod_no desc) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT p.PROD_NO, p.PROD_NAME, p.PROD_DETAIL, p.MANUFACTURE_DAY, p.PRICE, p.IMAGE_FILE, p.reg_date, t.tran_status_code FROM product p, transaction t p.prod_no = t.prod_no(+)
AND p.PROD_NO like '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.PROD_NAME like '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.PRICE like '%${searchKeyword}%'
) countTable
